description:
Britain’s public sector pensions bill is now larger than the size of the U.K. economy after it soared past £2.6 trillion for the first time, official figures show.

The post Public Sector Pensions Bill Hits Record £2.6 Trillion – Larger Than the U.K. Economy appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Public Sector Pensions Bill Hits Record £2.6 Trillion – Larger Than the U.K. Economy

description:
Arctic sea ice has continued its recent recovery despite 2023 being claimed as the hottest year on record globally, according to data reported by Germany's Alfred Wegener Institute.

The post Arctic Winter Sea Ice Continues Recovery Despite “Hottest Year Ever” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Arctic Winter Sea Ice Continues Recovery Despite “Hottest Year Ever”

description:
The Human Rights Act 1998 was a judicialisation of politics, says Dr David McGrogan. "It transfers political decisions away from democratic processes and into the courts, where it will be unsullied by the electorate."

The post How the Human Rights Act Undermines Democracy appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: How the Human Rights Act Undermines Democracy

description:
German officials have been caught admitting that they overstated the risk of COVID-19 to the public on the directions of the Ministry of Health in newly released FOI documents.

The post German Officials Overstated Covid Risk on Directions of Government, FOI Reveals appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: German Officials Overstated Covid Risk on Directions of Government, FOI Reveals

description:
Before the pandemic, Covid vaccine company BioNTech was focused on mRNA cancer treatment. But all its trials had failed. Why – did the drugs end up increasing cancers? We don't know because the results are kept secret.

The post Why Did BioNTech’s First Cancer Trials Falter? The German Regulator Must Know appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Did BioNTech’s First Cancer Trials Falter? The German Regulator Must Know

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the virus and the vaccines, the ‘climate emergency’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
